title: ISic020775. ISic020775
body:
Facsimile Images

δυν

Apparatus criticus

Text after Agostiniani, in Agostiniani, Albanese Procelli 2018.

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

This document with a sequence of three letters was found in grave 211, together with two other vessels with inscriptions, MMA 68 (ISic020756) and MMA 67 (ISic020774). Moreover, the same exact sequence also appears in another document from Montagna di Marzo but from another grave (MMA 32, ISic020776).

bibliography

    Agostiniani Forthcoming MMA 69 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002519
    Agostiniani, Albanese Procelli 2018 184-185, fig. 96 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001345
